value.title: DAX Fridays! #78: When should I use FILTER() with CALCULATE?
value.excerpt: When should you use the filter function with CALCULATE?  As you probably have noticed, sometimes people use a column in the filter part of CALCULATE and sometimes they use the FILTER function.  The question is, when should you use what?  In this video I will try to clarify that question.  Dont miss part

value.title: How to fix the "Too many elements in the enumeration to complete..." pivot error in Power Query
value.excerpt: Have you ever got the error: Expression.Error: There were too many elements in the enumeration to complete the operation.  when pivoting tables in Power Query?  In today's video I will show you why you get the error and two ways to fix it.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Import images in Power BI from local sources

He shows in his blog post how you can import images in Power BI from your local folder for offline use. value.title: 3 ways to REDUCE DATA In Power BI Desktop (No Premium needed!)
value.excerpt: Sometimes you want to reduce data in Power BI Desktop so it's easier to work with. Then work with all the data in the Power BI Service. Patrick shows you 3 ways that can help do this without using Incremental Refresh or needing Power BI Premium!  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Combining refresh and real time with Hybrid Tables in Power BI

value.title: Exploring the Visio visual in Power BI
